I like this game so much

A good game with the same amount of spice as a salt mine.
Played for 3 year, i got cancer, diabetes and my doctor said i should take pills to lower my blood pressure.

Game is very educational!


Learned Russian - cyka bliat (Is that it?)

Got a job - became Garbage collector (gotta carry the trash around)

Became famous - being reported by 9/10 players trying to be support shows you are adored by your team and the enemy's

Became tolerant - "Mid or Feed" they say... I guess people are nice, they give you two options instead of just going mid.

Became social - Parents abandoned me, I had to learn how to sell myself to get a sugar daddy

Graduated in Medicine - i can detect cancer on people by sight. (Ha! my parents always said "Computer games wont get u anywhere" and I got a Doctorate in DoTa. jokes on them)



In conclusion:

would get cancer again 5/7
